describe: Israel is a Middle Eastern country on the Mediterranean Sea, known for its rich history, diverse culture, and significant religious sites. It is a technologically advanced nation with a vibrant economy and a mix of modern and ancient attractions.

cities.name: 🏝 Tel Aviv
cities.geographical_location: Located on the country's Mediterranean coastline, northwest of Jerusalem.
cities.climate: Mediterranean climate with hot, humid summers and mild, wet winters.

cities.name: 🏔 Jerusalem
cities.geographical_location: Situated in the Judean Mountains between the Mediterranean and the Dead Sea.
cities.climate: Hot-summer Mediterranean climate with hot, dry summers and cool, wet winters.

cities.name: 🌆 Haifa
cities.geographical_location: Located in northern Israel, on the slopes of Mount Carmel facing the Mediterranean Sea.
cities.climate: Mediterranean climate with hot, dry summers and cool, rainy winters.

cities.name: 🏝 Eilat
cities.geographical_location: Situated at the southernmost tip of Israel, on the Red Sea coast.
cities.climate: Desert climate with extremely hot summers and mild winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Fresh seafood, Middle Eastern salads, and Date-based desserts.
